Keyboard shortcuts for VLC

A visual cheat-sheet for the 82 keyboard shortcuts found in VLC Player

Original Reference Report Issue

General

Fullscreen

  • F

Leave fullscreen

  • Esc

Play/Pause

  • Space

Pause only

  • ]

  • [

  • +

Slower

  • -
